[Page Title: Charleston, SC - Big Bad BreakfastPreviousNextScroll to top]

Charleston, South Carolina
456 MEETING STREET · CHARLESTON, SC 29403 Open DAILY 7AM-2:30PM Reservations not accepted. Walk-in only. (843) 459-1800 
Big Bad on the Eastside

Charleston…we’re serving breakfast cuisine full of inspiration and energy. One visit will guarantee you never look at a breakfast plate the same again. Whether it’s our house-cured Tabasco Brown Sugar Bacon, crispy southern fried chicken or Marsh Hen Mill grits, you’ll be talking about coming back before you’ve left the table. And don’t forget… we serve lunch too.

We also offer for take out and delivery through your favorite third party app.
